pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partially Overlapping Samples t-Tests // The "partially overlapping samples t-tests", for the comparison of means for two samples which include both paired observations and independent observations. [See Derrick, B., Russ, B., Toher, D. White P (2017). Test statistics for the comparison of means for two samples which include both paired observations and independent observations. Journal of Modern Applied Statistical Methods, 16(1)].
